attributes.action: stop councils clawing back benefit overpayment from those that need it most when coucil at fault
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my daughter earns £14,000 pa and has her brother living with her as he at college, she does not qualify for council tax benefit(only the single person allowance)even though the coucil tax is £1213,00 and gets £30a week towards rent of £675,00 a month,she does get working tax credit of £15 a week and child tax credit of £45 a week, she also gets child benefit of £17.00.she works 50+ hours a week, does not smoke or drink and rarely goes out. the council overpaid her by £1000.00 even though they had all paperwork concerning claim and they over looked some of the papers. they are clawing it back from her at £20 a week so she is only getting £10.00 a week towards her rent.
this is grossly not fair as this is their fault not hers and they should take responsibility. she like many others is being penilised.

stop this now
